mapper.insert: insert into community.question (title, description, gmtCreate, gmtModified, creator, commentCount, viewCount, likeCount, tag) value (#{title},#{description},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModified},#{creator},#{commentCount},#{viewCount},#{likeCount},#{tag})
mapper.select: select * from community.question where creator = #{userId} limit #{offset},#{size}
select count(1) from community.question where creator = #{userId}
mapper.update: update community.question set title = #{title},description = #{description} , tag = #{tag} , gmtModified = #{gmtModified} where id = #{id}
update community.question set viewCount = viewCount + 1 where id = #{id}
